channel.title: 2006-Reality
channel.description:
[center][size=10pt]I'm still looking for server coders click [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,552269.0.html]here[/url] to apply. [/size]
[size=24pt]2006-Reality[/size][size=8pt] Banner coming soon![/size]
Staff members: - [IMG]http://images.wikia.com/mechscape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img]Mod S
- [IMG]http://images.wikia.com/mechscape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img]Neroxxx - [IMG]http://images.wikia.com/mechscape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img]Ou08tlaw
2006-Reality is my new project, which is going to be a server that is unique and oldschool. The goal is to bring back the nostalgic feeling but not the same as it was; it's not a remake.
[size=14pt]Update Log:[/size] [code]12 July 2012 - Added music and sounds to the client 12 July 2012 - Added flax picking 12 July 2012 - Added flax spinning into bow string 12 July 2012 - Started working on combat sounds 13 July 2012 - Added beer drinking 13 July 2012 - Sounds for thieving, item dropping, item picking, eating, drinking and burying bones have been added 13 July 2012 - Started working on npc sounds[/code]
[size=14pt]Media:[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GcY6t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jubbt.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FOPIz.gif[/img] [/center]

item.title: 2006-Reality
item.dc:creator: @DaMatt17 DaMatt17
item.description:

it's not a remake

item.title: 2006-Reality
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

yeah, lets make a project insanity a '06 remake. that’s a great idea!
/sarcasm

Read full topic

item.title: 2006-Reality
item.dc:creator: @Zillkillyou Zillkillyou
item.description:
@Zillkillyou wrote:

[quote=“Jake2008, post:4, topic:449378”]2006-reality? wtf every server is using reality in their name when it doesnt even make sense L0L

how about 2006-flaxPicking since that seems to be the only feature on your server. Make sure you dont have over 20 players on at once tho trying to pick flax. Heard PI’s aint too stable.[/quote]

It doesn’t matter what order he does it, or how fast he does it. He could be a great coder for all we know. But If I knew even some coding I’d start my own server to just have fun programming it, letting people test it, whatnot. And that’s why I wouldn’t give out my base, people flame about each base in the world way too much.

tldr; just because he has one feature doesn’t mean it will be the only.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006-Reality
item.dc:creator: @DaMatt17 DaMatt17
item.description:
@DaMatt17 wrote:

someone2:

So by showing us that you added flax and a function for it you’re convincing us that you will succesfully make a 2006 remake?

It’s the media section, showing things that are already added, besides could you tell me the part which states that it is a 2006 remake?
I believe I did not say it was so if you don’t like it, off

Read full topic

The goal is to bring back the nostalgic feeling but not the same as it was; it's not a remake.

item.title: 2006-Reality
item.dc:creator: @DaMatt17 DaMatt17
item.description:
@DaMatt17 wrote:

[center][size=10pt]I’m still looking for server coders click here to apply.
[/size]

[size=24pt]2006-Reality[/size][size=8pt] Banner coming soon![/size]

Staff members:

  • Mod S

  • Neroxxx

  • Ou08tlaw

2006-Reality is my new project, which is going to be a server that is unique and oldschool.
The goal is to bring back the nostalgic feeling but not the same as it was; it’s not a remake.

[size=14pt]Update Log:[/size]

12 July 2012 - Added music and sounds to the client 12 July 2012 - Added flax picking 12 July 2012 - Added flax spinning into bow string 12 July 2012 - Started working on combat sounds 13 July 2012 - Added beer drinking 13 July 2012 - Sounds for thieving, item dropping, item picking, eating, drinking and burying bones have been added 13 July 2012 - Started working on npc sounds
